title: Binance Founder CZ Joins X Space to Clarify Aster Ties and Advisory Role

body.raw: This weekend, Binance founder Changpeng “CZ” Zhao popped into an X space with the Aster crew—a perpetual DEX project—and dished on his advisory role, while disclosing Aster’s links to ex-Binance people and noting that YZi Labs has a minority stake in Aster. Binance Founder CZ Tal
